scripts.release:prepatch: npm version prerelease --preid prepatch && npm publish --tag prepatch && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:preminor: npm version prerelease --preid preminor && npm publish --tag preminor && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:premajor: npm version prerelease --preid premajor && npm publish --tag premajor && git push --follow-tags
